title: Champion select bug help!
body:
In Champ select, when I press the "Spells" to choose them (ignite, flash etc) and then press 'x' to choose my champion, runes and masteries I can't. The background stays the same; a blurry, darker one where I can't press anything behind. I can only use 'tab' to scroll through things but I can't choose it.

Please Help!

replies.body:
Hi LilDoggeh,

Thanks for the report - can you let us know some more information to track down the cause of the problem? 

What queue were you in when you had this issue?
What Operating System are you using? (Windows 7/8/10, OS X)
Good thing time penalties still apply! It's really fun to receive multiple time penalties because I couldn't click on anything! Thanks for punishing me because of bad coding.

Having the same issue, I queue up (this time was vs ai intermediate), the screen comes up blurry and I am unable to click anything so cannot choose a champ, and have to close the client, I am now having to wait to queue because of this.

The champ select originally went blurry last night, I chose a champ and then went to check out her abilities, when I closed that window it was blurry and I couldn't change spells etc. But that was the last game I played for the night, and it is now happening the second I get into champ select.

Using Windows 10

{{champion:150}}
have thesame problem.. maybe new patch did so? i use windows 8
Ok this is getting out of hand I now have to wait 15 minutes because I had to abandon so many games because of this issue!!

Queue: Normals and tested in Custom
Operating System: Windows 10
Same happening to me. Happens after I pick and before somtimes. Really frustating.

Yeah im having the same issue.   Keep getting locked out of games after accepting a match.
direct link to my photobucket.
Windows 10. 
Screen gets a grey shader and unable to do anything after there. 
http://i21.photobucket.com/albums/b272/silva69/lolgreyscreenofdeath_zpszpmkikeo.png

I have an issue where my client force closes as soon as i either get in queue and the game is about to pop up the accept or decline match bar, or close any tab such a s the help and support tab in the client itself.. tried for hours today to fix with no resolution{{item:3070}}
Same here - Windows 10, had it in solo, AI and team ranked queue. Our team had to dodge because I couldn't pick a champ :(
Ok so it just happened again and this time it was after a game so I couldn't see my stats or chat. Is there any way to attach a picture of the problem?

Ive had this issue as well about 5 times today all in ranked so ive been forced to dodge or my duo has been forced to dodge because of this. 

Operating system is windows 8.1
Que: ranked. 

It doesnt happen all the time but it happens at least every second game

I got the issue too... my operating system is window 7 and also it it black screen from champ select it will continue until the end of ur game too
I test it is only for classic matches

Same has happened to me. Sometimes when I get into champion select it just goes blurry straight away and I cant press or do anything, all I can do is close the client and then I have to wait 5 mins to play again. Has happened 3 times already today and I am frustrated :( I am using windows 10 and it has only been happening since I updated the game today.
It just happened again but this time someone didn't accept a game so it went back to looking for a team and then the screen went blurry again :/ had to close the client

I also have this issue. Happened when i was in champ select for ranked. 
iv got windows 10.
In detail you click the summoner spells and choose one, once you selected it the menu disappears. But the client is still in the dark mode as if still choosing, It does not let you choose a champ or do anything else
I've had this issue too. Rito Plz. Now i have to wait five minutes.
Same with me. Happened a few times and doesn't go away unless you quit the client. Happened twice today now I'm in low priority queue. This sucks.
